wordGroup: value-added service 增值服务；增值业务

sentences.en: This is the value-added role of WHO.
sentences.cn: 这是世卫组织的增值作用。

sentences.en: Comparative advantage is shifting to high value-added sectors.
sentences.cn: 相对优势正转移向高附加值行业。

sentences.en: There real value-added rose only sluggishly, but employment expanded significantly.
sentences.cn: 实际增值提升缓慢，就业人数却显著增长。
